column1: Identify a feeling you're having. Give yourself permission to feel it. Journal for 5 minutes about it.
column2: Make yourself a cup of tea / hot cocoa / coffee.
column3: Get a hug! In-person is best... but over email or IM or text is fine.
column4: Make a list of five things you like about yourself.
column5: Make a list of five things you've accomplished this week - no matter how small.
column6: Give yourself a hand or head massage!
column7: Call or text or IM a friend.
column8: Spend 10-15 minutes writing about something you value.
column9: Read a new or favorite poem!
column10: Give yourself a treat or ritual to acknowledge the hard things in life and celebrate the fact that you've made it this far.
column11: Do something you're good at! Write a drabble or bake brownies or get your outfit just right.
column14: Take a warm bath or shower – especially if you have favorite bath/shower scents handy.
column16: Get up and stretch! Do some light exercise if you're up to it.
column17: Perform a random act of kindness.
column18: Make a to-do list of things you can to in 5 minutes or less... and do one thing.
column19: Listen to a song that cheers you up.
column20: Watch a favorite episode or movie.
column24: Take a minute and <a href="http://zenhabits.net/breathe/">focus on your breath</a>.
column25: Google images of your favorite animal.
